reuters.title: BUSH INDUSTRIES <BSH> SEES HIGHER YEAR RESULTS
reuters.body: Bush Industries Inc said it expects higher earnings and sales for 1987, partly due to efficiencies in manufacturing that have improved its margins. The company reported first quarter earnings of 1,328,000 dlrs, up from 344,000 dlrs a year before, on sales of 23.0 mln dlrs, up from 12.3 mln dlrs. For all of last year it earned 2,506,000 dlrs on sales of 65.4 mln dlrs. Reuter 
